title: CTO
hook: The activities of the CTO range from the definition of the needs to the implementation of the architecture and the development teams. More broadly, I support the project owner throughout the technical part of the project by providing concrete answers to questions and advising on the strategy to be put in place. I make sure to take into account the financial means and external constraints in order to propose the most efficient solution. Whether it is from a recruitment point of view, subcontracting, legislation, hosting, equipment ... I like to start from scratch to bring the project to a level of maturity that gives it legitimacy on its market, but I also know how to adapt quickly to the existing to continue to improve it while reducing technical debts. I feel very concerned by the strategic side of the company and I like to have a global vision of the project (needs, market, finances) but I still know how to code. I attach great importance to the durability of the code written and I train the teams to produce high-performance and durable code that will give the project the capacity to evolve and adapt to future technological advances.
